system

Class EventSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.EventSystem

  • public class EventSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller that contains all things that directly involves events.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventSystem

        public EventSystem(EventManager eventmanager,
                   UserManager usermanager,
                   java.lang.String conference,
                   java.lang.String myName)
        Initializes the event system, gets which event manager, user manager, conference that it controls.
        Parameters:
        eventmanager - the event manager that the system controls.
        usermanager - the user manager that the system controls.
        conference - the conference name of the chosen conference.
        myName - the name of the user logged in.
